profileText: a Representative from Colorado; born in Pueblo, Colo., January 1967; graduated from Central High School, Pueblo, Colo., 1985; B.A., Colorado State University, Fort Collins, Colo., 1990; staff, United States Representative Joel Hefley of Colorado, 1991-1998; radio show host; internet commentator; professional advocate; unsuccessful candidate for nomination to the One Hundred Tenth Congress in 2006; unsuccessful candidate for nomination to the One Hundred Eleventh Congress in 2008; elected as a Republican to the One Hundred Nineteenth Congress (January 3, 2025-present).
